Text: FW Client InfoMessage From Hirsch Rick Sent Tuesday May PM To Cc Subject FW Client Info Here are attachments In order of appearance they are Master Netting Agreement USCUSTST The Terms of Business Agreement TOB LME Guide LME Guidance Letter LME Guidance Letter Payment and Settlement Instructions The TOB is the standard trading agreement and is the most important The Master Netting Agreement simply avoids the country by country and state by state possibility of cherry picking in a defaultbankruptcy event The Guidance letters are LME requirements Payments are self explanatory Again I think the TOB is a simple document and applies to regular exchange cleared LME client business Not only is it simpler and applicable for this transaction but also the regular cleared contracts which are invloved fall into PART Exemption of the CFTC This exemption requires Sogemin to protect of any resulting client profits by means of an updated bond Bankers Trust This guaranty is only for profits generated by US companies The benefit to Enron is that you receive full credit coverage for your profits above and beyond the brokers net worth I hope this TOB method helps expidite our business We very much look forward to showing off our superb price execution for Enron Regards Richard Hirsch StandardTOBMNANonNYjurisdictiondoc USCUSTSTDNOMNAdoc TOBAttachmentdoc TOBAttachementdoc TOBAttachmentCovdoc TOBAttAccountsdoc

FW Client InfoMessage From Hirsch Rick Sent Tuesday May PM To Cc Subject FW Client Info Here are attachments In order of appearance they are Master Netting Agreement USCUSTST The Terms of Business Agreement TOB LME Guide LME Guidance Letter LME Guidance Letter Payment and Settlement Instructions The TOB is the standard trading agreement and is the most important The Master Netting Agreement simply avoids the country by country and state by state possibility of cherry picking in a defaultbankruptcy event The Guidance letters are LME requirements Payments are self explanatory Again I think the TOB is a simple document and applies to regular exchange cleared LME client business Not only is it simpler and applicable for this transaction but also the regular cleared contracts which are invloved fall into PART Exemption of the CFTC This exemption requires Sogemin to protect of any resulting client profits by means of an updated bond Bankers Trust This guaranty is only for profits generated by US companies The benefit to Enron is that you receive full credit coverage for your profits above and beyond the brokers net worth I hope this TOB method helps expidite our business We very much look forward to showing off our superb price execution for Enron Regards Richard Hirsch StandardTOBMNANonNYjurisdictiondoc USCUSTSTDNOMNAdoc TOBAttachmentdoc TOBAttachementdoc TOBAttachmentCovdoc TOBAttAccountsdoc
